HtmlBody:
Delicious Chocolate Cake

Ingredients:

  • 2 cups flour
  • 1 cup sugar
  • 1/2 cup cocoa powder

Mix all ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
Subject: Recipe: Delicious Chocolate Cake
TextBody:
Delicious Chocolate Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 cups flour
- 1 cup sugar
- 1/2 cup cocoa powder

Mix all ingredients and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
